description: a group of men in a church yard gambling on top of a tomb; man with rod, wearing hat and coat behind them; skulls on ground in foreground
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription
on sheet  in black: IDLE \'PRENTICE prophaning the sabbath in the church yard during Divine Service  Plate 3.  / Designed by WHogarth  Proverbs Chap. XIX.Verse 20.  Judgements are prepared for scorners & stripes for the back of Fools.
title: Print
